attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Request that the government repsects the sanctity of life from conception to death. 
Medically and legally we request that the following is enshrined in law; 1. Abortions should only be carried out only if serious health risks are presnt to mother and or child.
2. Suicidal people are proactivly assisted in the community to overcome their illness or situation.
3. Euthanaisa should remain illegal and those with terminal illness must recieve thearuptic care to enhance life through the hospice movement.
4. THe death penalty should never be allowed and any extradition sought by governments should be refused if the country supports capital punishment.

In doing this, we believe the UK will be a fairer place to live
